function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Failure to comply with social distancing and staying at home measures","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Education and enforcement of social distancing and stay-at-home guidelines","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, surveillance technology","People":"General public","Owner":"Health authorities, government"},{"Description":"Lack of substantive moral support for the measures","Impact":"Reduced compliance with mitigation measures leading to increased spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Public awareness campaigns, community engagement","Technologies":"Social media platforms, public communication channels","People":"General public","Owner":"Community leaders, public health organizations"}]}
